page.title: 10How I spend Sundays,Wantage.
page.content: I get up at about 7.30am,put on jodhpurs and a warm jumper,go down the stairs and get out the cornflakes and have my breakfast. I play with my small brother and sister until lunch time.Then I put on my riding hat,coat and waistcoat. I get my money (4 pounds) and Daddy takes me in the car or van to go riding. I tack up a pony and Sally, my teacher, gives me a lesson.After the ride I unsaddle the pony,take it into the stable,put away the tack and help until 4 o'clock. At home I have tea then I watch television.I like "Robin of Sherwood" Then I have a bath and go to bed. I like Sundays.
